author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add the complete list of the new PPS XML files and make muon set with the unmounted GE11

#### PR validation:

The new scenario for 2025 is to be defined once the PPS PR is merged

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Run3-gex187W Add the complete list of the new PPS XML files and make muon set with the unmounted GE11
